description:
Miles is currently an amateur boxer on the verge of going professional.

He's been boxing since he was ten, but now he's a heavyweight with an impressive record.

"What got you into boxing?" I asked.

"I was a skinny kid," he said. "That was my motivation."

"And what do you like most about it?"

"The discipline," he replied. "It takes a lot of discipline to train 2 or 3 hours a day!"
title: Miles
